summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 7, 2020, discussing the transfer of Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and her upcoming bail hearing. The emails are between FBI personnel from the Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit and the New York field office, seeking updates on the case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; she was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and is scheduled for a bail hearing.

persons.name: SSA CARD Coordinator
persons.context: The FBI agent from the Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit who initiated the email inquiry about Maxwell's transfer and hearing details.

events.title: Maxwell transferred to MDC Brooklyn
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn.

events.title: Scheduled bail hearing for Maxwell
events.description: Maxwell is expected to have a bail hearing, possibly on Friday, July 10, 2020, or the following week.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn on July 6, 2020.
A bail hearing for Maxwell was scheduled for July 10, 2020, but could be moved to the following week.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit was actively seeking updates on Maxwell's case status.
The email chain indicates ongoing coordination between different FBI units regarding Maxwell's detention and legal proceedings.
